$(document).ready(function() {
  $('#Field5').on('change', function() {
    var val = $('#Field5').val();
    $('.js-timepick-box').find('.form-group').removeClass('js-isactive');
    $('.js-timepick-box').find('.req').html('');
    if(val == '7800') {
      $('#store_default').show();
      $('.js-timepick-box').hide();
    } else {
      $('#store_default').hide();
      $('.js-timepick-box').show();
      var this_timepick = $('.js-timepick-box').find('.js-timepick-' + val);
      this_timepick.show().addClass('js-isactive').siblings().hide();
      this_timepick.find('.req').html('*');
    }
  })

  $(".js-submit").on("click", function() {

    $("#Field26").val('');
    $("#Field27").val('');
    if($(".js-isactive").find(".datepicker-event").val()) {
      var thisDate = $(".js-isactive").find(".datepicker-event").val().replace(/\//g, '').replace(/^(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{4})$/, "$3-$2-$1");
    }
    var thisTimeVal = $(".js-isactive").find(".sub-select").val();
    var thisTime = $(".js-isactive").find(".sub-select" + " option[value='" + thisTimeVal + "']").text();

    $("#Field26").val(thisDate);
    $("#Field27").val(thisTime);
    console.log(thisDate, thisTime);
    if(allFieldValidate()) {
      setTimeout(function() {
        //  fbq('track', 'CompleteRegistration', {
        //    value: 1,
        //    currency: 'hkd',
        //  });
        //  gtag('event', 'conversion', {
        //    'allow_custom_scripts': true,
        //    'send_to': 'DC-9512706/macfy0/macfy00+standard'
        //  });
        fbq('track', 'CompleteRegistration');

        clickSave();
      }, 200)
    }
  })

  $('#Field5').on('change', function() {
    var fid = '';
    switch($('#Field5').val()) {
      case '7801':
        fid = '288';//放置7801对应的value值
        break;
    }
    if($('#Field5').val() != '7800') {
      if(typeof window['sub_datepicker_' + $('#Field5').val()] == 'undefined') {
        ajaxUrl = 'https://webform.xgate.com/app/index.php/webforms/form/ajaxRegDatePickerByField?encid=73ad48dd-4e99-360b-648b-10b7c8aaa0a9&tracker=478d9559-4bf7-4e67-9872-f6641ed57ae2&id=' + fid;
        $.ajax({
          type: 'GET',
          url: ajaxUrl,
          async: false,
          success: function(result) {
            var s = document.createElement('script');
            s.src = 'data:text/javascript,' + encodeURIComponent(result);
            document.body.appendChild(s);
          },
        });
      }
    } else {
      $('#store_default').show();
      $('.js-timepick-box').hide();
    }
  });
});
